post.author: 김중수
post.content: Seeking a Change in Your Career—Featured Job of the Week: EPSILON Oracle Database Administrator Requisition # 8390 Location: Wakefield, MA The Database Administrator will focus on the re-design and implementation of the database infrastructure, including Failover, Disaster Recovery, Performance Monitoring, Capacity Planning, and Automation of database related processes. 7+ years of Oracle database administration experience on UNIX (Sun Solaris preferred) & Linux (RedHat) primarily supporting Data Warehousing environments. 2+ years of hands experience supporting Oracle RAC 10g or 11g on a Linux environment. Strong understanding of advanced database concepts and infrastructures. Very strong Unix/Linux shell scripting and Oracle SQL (PL/SQL desired but not required) scripting expertise for standardization/automation of database tasks. B.S. in Computer Science or other technical degree required. To view additional details on this job and other current openings for Alliance Data, Epsilon or LoyaltyOne log on to PeopleSoft ADO (use your network username and password to sign in).
post.title: Oracle Admin job in Epsilon (USA)
